BreakOutLevel.301010111.2:
Welcome to Bouncing Bumper Bash! Let's dive into the tutorial to learn the basics:

1. Try moving the launcher to shoot or bounce marbles.

2. Use Trekker skills to destroy tiles.

3. Learn how to score and what it takes to win or lose.
BreakOutLevel.301010112.2:
Time for the advanced tutorial! In this stage:
1. Enemies move while they attack. Move the launcher to dodge their bullets.
2. Both marbles and character skills can deal damage to enemies.
3. Learn the functions of various dropped items.
BreakOutLevel.301010121.2:
The cunning enemies are hiding behind the tiles. Destroy the tiles first, then take them out!
Be cautious when picking up dropped items. They could be deadly bombs!
BreakOutLevel.301010122.2:
These high-defense tiles take several hits to destroy.
Be cautious when picking up dropped items. Fireballs deal extra damage and can penetrate tiles.
BreakOutLevel.301010131.2:
The terrain has become more complex. Proceed with caution!
A new type of dropped item that may extend or shorten the launcher has appeared!
BreakOutLevel.301010132.2:
You discovered a new deviceâ€”the ejector pillar!
When a marble hits the ejector pillar, it gains a short burst of acceleration.
BreakOutLevel.301010141.2:
Welcome to the challenge stage!
A black hole has appeared in this sector! The marble's trajectory will be altered by the black hole's gravitational pull.
BreakOutLevel.301010142.2:
Welcome to the challenge stage!
Confront the wrath of the cosmos. Prove yourself, cadet.
